```py
@serve.deployment
class Featurizer: …

@serve.deployment
class Predictor: …

@serve.deployment
class Orchestrator
   def __init__(self):
      self.featurizer = Featurizer.get_handle()
      self.predictor = Predictor.get_handle()

   async def __call__(self, inp):
      feat = await self.featurizer.remote(inp)
      predicted = await self.predictor.remote(feat)
      return predicted

if __name__ == “__main__”:
    Featurizer.deploy()
    Predictor.deploy()
    Orchestrator.deploy()
```
